title: py-h5py needs package py-pkgconfig
body:
My build of `py-h5py` fails with this error message:

```
Executing cythonize()
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "setup.py", line 149, in <module>
    cmdclass = CMDCLASS,
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/core.py", line 151, in setup
    dist.run_commands()
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 953, in run_commands
    self.run_command(cmd)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 972, in run_command
    cmd_obj.run()
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/command/install.py", line 563, in run
    self.run_command('build')
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/cmd.py", line 326, in run_command
    self.distribution.run_command(command)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 972, in run_command
    cmd_obj.run()
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/command/build.py", line 127, in run
    self.run_command(cmd_name)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/cmd.py", line 326, in run_command
    self.distribution.run_command(command)
  File "/xfs1/eschnetter/spacktest/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.0-spacktest/python-2.7.12-b5sf3vacbqfghadqm6uj2tti2oemd3xy/lib/python2.7/distutils/dist.py", line 972, in run_command
    cmd_obj.run()
  File "/tmp/eschnetter/spack-stage/spack-stage-fBrRmJ/h5py-2.6.0/setup_build.py", line 188, in run
    self.extensions = cythonize(self._make_extensions(config),
  File "/tmp/eschnetter/spack-stage/spack-stage-fBrRmJ/h5py-2.6.0/setup_build.py", line 73, in _make_extensions
    import pkgconfig
ImportError: No module named pkgconfig
```

I believe this means that the package depends on the Python package `py-pkgconfig` https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pkgconfig which does not yet exist in Spack.
